sentences.english: Life is light as leaf, gone easily by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 生命輕浮的像一片葉，容易被風帶走。

sentences.english: The dead man shatters giddy wisdoms as if he were punching his pillow.
sentences.chinese: 他想破碎輕浮的智巧，就像用拳頭打枕頭。

sentences.english: Women need to dress alluringly but not in a cheap way.
sentences.chinese: 女式則需打扮的誘人而不輕浮。

sentences.english: Your fickle attitude will be your demise when it comes to love this week.
sentences.chinese: 本週提到愛情的時候，你輕浮的態度是你的死穴。

sentences.english: whether the twitterati are more annoying or just more flighty than everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 也不知道是否社交網絡達人會比較惹人厭或更輕浮。

sentences.english: An element of frivolity keeps a soul from atrophying.
sentences.chinese: 輕浮的一個元素可以防止精神萎縮。

sentences.english: Her one worry was her sudden tendency to become light-headed.
sentences.chinese: 她唯一擔心就是她的舉止會突然的變得輕浮失禮。

sentences.english: Iraq and the bosom embrace me, except I preexistence is frivolous.
sentences.chinese: 伊，攬我之懷，除我前世輕浮。

sentences.english: The holiness of God requires us to take our worship seriously and not to participate frivolously.
sentences.chinese: 神的聖潔要求我們在敬拜他時保持嚴肅，不可輕浮。

sentences.english: Her flirtatious manners are intended to attract.
sentences.chinese: 她的輕浮舉止是想引人注意。

sentences.english: Listen, fellow, I'm a black-belt in karate, so don't try to get fresh with me.
sentences.chinese: 聽着，傢伙，我是空手道黑帶，所以別想對我輕浮。

sentences.english: In the pool, she must have been giddy with agreeability.
sentences.chinese: 泳池裏的她肯定因爲溫順而顯得輕浮。

sentences.english: Stylish and sharp, Wallis had a vaguely raffish edge.
sentences.chinese: 而華麗斯則時髦且鮮明，恍惚帶着幾分輕浮。

sentences.english: She seems frivolous, but deep down she is a very serious person.
sentences.chinese: 她看來輕浮但本質上是個很正經的人。

definition: to turn a blind eye to/to ignore
